.exit
const { ethers } = await import("hardhat");
.exit
(await ethers.provider.getBlockNumber()).toString();
const { ethers } = await import("hardhat");
.exit
(await ethers.provider.getBlockNumber()).toString();
const { ethers } = await import("hardhat");
import { ethers } from "hardhat";
const { ethers } = require("hardhat");
(await ethers.provider.getBlockNumber()).toString()
